Reviews.Title: “Excellent location at a reasonable price.”
Reviews.Author: PedroMSanchez
Reviews.Content: found hotel chance internet arguably value barcelona located centrally eixample walking distance plaza catalunya 20 min 1 minute walking distance nearest tube station clean bathrooms friendly helpful staff 60 ent

Reviews.Title: “Nice enough place, small room”
Reviews.Author: travelingman59
Reviews.Content: 510 nice sized bathroom nicely appointed drawback towels provided threadbare cut rags bigger queen sized bed fine day walking barcelona seeing sights hotel main thoroughfare 1015 blocks main tourist liked buffet breakfast optional service friendly selections fresh plentiful paid 127 night weekend bad deal liked barcelona

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: Sigrutten
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel nights stayed hotel 20 taking marathon nice hotel located quiet street traffic slept child nights cafees supermarket close hotel rambla walking distance hotel 20 minutes sore metro station nearby cleaning lady bit angry job clean breakfast buffet hotel manager breakfast half hour earlier announced start marathon

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful hotel, but far from everything”
Reviews.Author: FelipeRocha
Reviews.Content: positives hotel comfortable modern breakfast amazing despite little expensive try santiago cake incredible comfortable despite little tiny bathroom modern size bedroom negatives location negative aspect hotel touristic attractions metro station blocks hotel neighborhood supermarkets restaurants near hotel resume hotel located expensive

Reviews.Title: “A good base to explore Barcelona”
Reviews.Author: jaysouthuk
Reviews.Content: hotel short walk 5mins hospital clinic station line 5 receptionist friendly handed map city terrace floor reception lift stairs nice bit beds comfortable bathroom nice sink complimentary shower gel soap toothbrush etc free wifi bring laptop free safe nice 3 course evening meal wine hotel €20 person complaint returned hotel day shopping barcelona centre arrived 330pm reception housekeeping 5pm madeup shortly afterwards hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel for bussines trips”
Reviews.Author: macavigo
Reviews.Content: usual bussines traveller im impersonal hotels told stay happy cause hotel isnt amenities surprised complain bathroom ok free amenities nh hotels learn free wifi near tube station nice restaurants dinner hotel repeat trips

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, great find”
Reviews.Author: CRobo
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 7 nights august wonderful time situated 5 mins hospital clinic metro station walk station hotel floor nice little bed incredibly comfortable manufacturers name consider changing own bed clean bathroom decent size complaint nice teacoffee facilities provided list available tv channels helpful restaurant fantastic restaurants nearby try stay supermarket corner street sells including reasonable priced chilled cava amazing bakery 2 mins hotel pastries die staff helpful arrival requested iron ironing board brought minutes dampmould patch bathroom ceiling caused pipe leak floor hotel booked staff dealt issue quickly efficiently placed vent cover unsightly happy free wi fi throughout hotel decent bandwidth enabling check emails book trips throughout stay fabulous stay definitely stay recommend

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel”
Reviews.Author: ConorFi
Reviews.Content: stayed week positive hotels include locations short distance city center subway service bars restaurant clean modern balcony didnt didnt staff friendly breakfast disorganized mornings overall value money option doesnt outstanding characteristics

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: sameoldg2
Reviews.Content: stayed conference decided attend minute hotels throughout city sold snagged location youre near tourist chaos walking distance gran via eixample hospital clinic metro theres grocery store corner hotel nicely decorated throughout doesnt boutique hotel look nicer typical chain thats surprising europe wont spend time inside barcelona anyway window looked shaft didnt lot light slept comfortably night youre nap visiting spain walls thin youll hear cleaning crew people closing doors etc day found strange lack information schedule wakeup call couldnt front desk calling service

Reviews.Title: “Fair choice”
Reviews.Author: VTania
Reviews.Content: 3 girlfriends looking bit comfort visiting exciting barcelona hotel difficult especially durring 1 night decided walk downtown hotel god bless gps located close subway downtown change trains hotel nice modern design indoors clean ours balcony staff helpfull nice internet decent choose id offer regular price worth

Reviews.Title: “Very nice, Modern hotel in convenient location - safe neighborhood”
Reviews.Author: WhatMickyEats
Reviews.Content: pleasantly surprised quality hotel traveled throughout europe expecting typical frills tiny bathroom hotel offered average size clean bathroom agree reviews walls little thin lock door maid enter resting otherwise front desk staff helpful held bags day check hours kill catching flight restaurant hotel ate breakfast 10 euros bit overpriced ate breakfast nearby pastry shops day metro day found walk easy hospital clinic stop blue l5 safety walking night

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value”
Reviews.Author: JB_and_Amy
Reviews.Content: hotel booked hotelscom nicer expected price paid slightly centre barcelona las ramblas tourist hotels price reflected walk wasnt bad luxurious bathroom comfortable bed furnished clean obviously aimed business market perfectly suited city break
